Name: Discord Rich Me! (Custom Rich Presence)
About the game: What is this? Discord Rich Me! Is an application created by Varstep Studios that allows you to customize your Discord Rich Presence (RPC) quickly and dynamically. Create, Save, Load, do whatever you want, Discord Rich Me! allows it!
